TOUR.SEARCH: You can search for items from anywhere in the app and filter through items when you are on items list page.
TOUR.BALANCE: Your balance in ETH. Clicking on balance will take you to the wallet, where you can transfer funds, buy ETH, and more.
TOUR.BBT: The BBT (BitBoost Token) is the internal currency for listing items. Listing fee is equal to ~1$ in BBT.  Without BBT, sellers cannot list items.
TOUR.TRANSACTION: You can track all the transactions you have made, either successful or failed, through your chosen explorer.
TOUR.BLOCK_EXPLORER: You can define your favorite block explorer to track the transactions.
TOUR.VIEWALL: Your main page for buying stuff. Check them out!
TOUR.MYITEMS: Your main page for selling stuff. There is a Listing Wizard and a one-page Advanced option. Try both!
TOUR.PREFERENCES: Configure the application for your liking
TOUR.BETA: You are participating in Beta test of the app. Please read the necessary information and rock it! Thank you :)

REVIEWS.MY_EXPLAINATION: Keeping good rating is important both for getting more sales and getting accepted as a buyer
REVIEWS.USER_EXPLAINATION: This is how people with experience of trading with this person rate them
REVIEWS.LEAVE_REVIEW_TEXT: Please leave trustworthy and deployed reviews as they affect other users' reputation dramatically!

PASSWORD.TITLE: Create Wallet
PASSWORD.SUBTITLE: Create your Block wallet and set a password
PASSWORD.DESC: Congratulations, you have created The Block wallet! This is a normal Ethereum wallet which you can find in your Documents folder and use for your own purposes. We are going to give you a tour introducing you to different features of the application. You can operate hints with right/left buttons on your keyboard. Thank you for choosing The Block!
PASSWORD.INSTRUCTIONS: Please set a password for your Block wallet.
PASSWORD.LENGTH_ERROR: Password must be longer than 6 characters

NOTIFICATIONS.ORDER_APPROVED_EXT: Your order has been approved by the seller! Your payment  for the order will be sent to an escrow account.
NOTIFICATIONS.ORDER_REJECTED_EXT: Your order has been declined by the seller.

VIEW_ITEM.TITLE: View Item
VIEW_ITEM.ORDER_COMPLETE: Order complete, please finalize it or open a dispute.
VIEW_ITEM.ORDER_PENDING: Pending. Waiting for approval from seller.

NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_0_DESC: List your item in no time! Follow 7 simple steps to have your item listed. We'll start with item's title.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_1_DESC: Describe your item here. A detailed description will be helpful to potential buyers.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_2_DESC: You may enter links to your item's images, or you may upload your images using our service. Uploads use the Imgur service and are absolutely anonymous. Though not required, adding pictures is highly recommended.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_3_DESC: Items are classified in The Block by category. Please choose your category for your item carefully, as it may only appear in one category and this will help buyers to find your item.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_4_DESC: Please enter the delivery options you offer to your buyer. Please be as specific as you can (e.g., DHL to North America). Leave blank if you are selling online content or are shipping for free.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_5_DESC: Put in your Escrow address here. Though not required, items with a third-party Escrow are much more trusted in the BitBoost community.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.STEP_6_DESC: This is the final step. Fill in quantity of the goods being sold, listing duration, and price.
NEWITEM_WIZARD.TITLE: Item Listing Wizard
NEWITEM_WIZARD.SUBTITLE: E-commerce Redefined

LIST_NEW_ITEM.SUCCESS_TEXT: Your item has been listed. Please note the listing ID:
LIST_NEW_ITEM.IMAGE_HELP: Click the 'Upload' button to crop and upload your image anonymously to Imgur.
LIST_NEW_ITEM.AGREEMENT_SHORT: By listing this item, I agree with The Block Terms of Service and I take full responsibility for my actions.

PREFERENCES.TITLE: Preferences
PREFERENCES.CLEAR_CACHE: Clear cache, preferences and saved data.
PREFERENCES.SUBTITLE: Block settings
PREFERENCES.NICKNAME_ERROR: A nickname is required. This name will be displayed in place of the full address when you select this address for use.
PREFERENCES.DEFAULT_BLACKLIST_HELP_ON: Turn this option off to see all items listed for sale. CAUTION: This may reveal items that are illegal to purchase in your jurisdiction.  Remove filters at your own risk.
PREFERENCES.DEFAULT_BLACKLIST_HELP_OFF: Turn this option on to hide filtered items.
PREFERENCES.BLACKLIST_ADD_TEXT: Subscribe to a 3rd party filter service provider:
PREFERENCES.PRIVACY_HELP_REGULAR: Regular Privacy uses a remote copy of the Ethereum blockchain, maintained by The Block's developers. Change to High Privacy to use your own, local copy of the blockchain.
PREFERENCES.PRIVACY_HELP_HIGH: High Privacy uses your own, local copy of the Ethereum blockchain. Change to Regular Privacy to use a remote copy of the Ethereum blockchain maintained by The Block's developers.
PREFERENCES.LOGIN_HELP_ON: Buying and selling requires that you log in. Turn this setting OFF to buy and sell without logging in.
PREFERENCES.LOGIN_HELP_OFF: You may buy and sell without logging in. Turn this setting ON to require logging in to buy and sell.
PREFERENCES.2FA_HELP_ALWAYS: The Block will ask you to scan the QR code every time you log in, starting from your next login.
PREFERENCES.2FA_HELP_TIMEOUT: The Block will ask you to re-scan the QR code every month.
PREFERENCES.2FA_HELP_NEVER: The Block will never ask you to re-scan the QR code. Be careful: if you lose your 2FA device you will never be able to log in to your account.
PREFERENCES.2FA_HELP_DISABLED: 2FA disabled. Only your password will be required to log in.

NEWS.TITLE: News
NEWS.SUBTITLE: The latest news about The Block

HELP.TITLE: Help
HELP.SUBTITLE: Help with The Block
HELP.Q1_TEXT: The Block is a global, encrypted online marketplace where you can buy and sell with privacy.
HELP.Q2_TEXT: The listing fee is 1 USD in BBT. Unlike other popular markets, no extra fees are taken from your final sale price.
HELP.Q3_HEADER: How can I refill my wallet?
HELP.Q3_TEXT: It is possible to fill or refill your Wallet in two ways. Once you have created your Wallet, you may either send ether to it directly, or you may buy ether from within the Wallet, using bitcoin.
HELP.Q5_TEXT: BitBoost does not encourage the sale of illegal items. However, the world is a big place, and not every item is illegal, or legal, in every jurisdiction. The Terms of Use simply require that you comply with your local laws, which is your responsibility.
HELP.Q6_HEADER: Can I use BTC or other coins?
HELP.Q6_TEXT: Not at the moment. However, you may buy ether using bitcoin from within your Block Wallet. We are investigating how to bring support for buying and getting paid with more coins, including bitcoin.
HELP.Q7_HEADER: What if I lose my password?
HELP.Q7_TEXT: Your password is important. Do not lose or forget your password, or you will be unable to access your ether. The developers cannot help you if you lose your password, so be careful.
HELP.Q8_TEXT: Filtering is a way for you to control which items you see in The Block. There is no censorship in The Block, so filtering is turned on by default for your protection. You may turn filters off by clicking the Preferences tab and then the Filter toggle. You may also select new filters as they become available, or create your own. Caution: Turning all filters off may cause items to be displayed that are illegal in your jurisdiction. Proceed at your own discretion.
HELP.Q9_HEADER: How do I turn filtering on/off?
HELP.Q9_TEXT: Filter controls are on the Preferences page. Click the Preferences tab in the Dashboard panel on the left side of this application.
HELP.Q10_TEXT: While the developers provide a single, default filter, it is possible for you to subscribe to more than one filter. For example, you may wish to subscribe to a filter that only hides items that are illegal in your jurisdiction, or that are inappropriate for children, or that are forbidden by your religion. We hope that filter providers will make a wide variety of third-party filters available.
